amendment.description: To include electric thermal storage technologyas a weaterization material under the Energy Conservation in Existing Buildings Act of 1976.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1764 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1764 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S11813-11814; text: CR S11814) To include electric thermal storage technologyas a weaterization material under the Energy Conservation in Existing Buildings Act of 1976.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1764 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1764 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
